video.title: My Animal Friends
video.synopsis: Tag along on an exciting adventure with an array of animal friends in the wild and find out how they live, what they eat and more.

episodes.synopsis: From ants to elephants, journey into the exciting lives of fascinating creatures who teach you what their lives are like growing up.
episodes.title: Ant-Elephant

episodes.synopsis: Watch, listen and learn as the cheetah and the tern tell you in their own words what life is like growing up on land and in the air.
episodes.title: Cheetah & Tern

episodes.synopsis: Meet a majestic young horse and a sweet little turtle who show you what it's like growing up in the wild.
episodes.title: Horse & Turtle

episodes.synopsis: Get a glimpse into the early childhoods of a parakeet and a zebra, who tell you in their own words what it's like growing up.
episodes.title: Parakeet & Zebra

episodes.synopsis: The sea horse and the dingo take you on a spellbinding journey into their lives growing up in the wild.
episodes.title: Sea Horse & Dingo

episodes.synopsis: Take a thrilling ride into the wilderness and learn what it's like to be a young kangaroo and a young echidna.
episodes.title: Kangaroo & Echidna

episodes.synopsis: From the rivers to the skies, get an up-close look at the lives of a beautiful little butterfly and a fierce young crocodile.
episodes.title: Butterfly & Crocodile

episodes.synopsis: A clownfish and a bear take you on a fascinating journey, sharing their stories of what it's like growing up in the wild.
episodes.title: Clown Fish & Bear

episodes.synopsis: A graceful gazelle and a little sea lion take you on a spellbinding adventure into their childhood lives.
episodes.title: Sea Lion & Gazelle

episodes.synopsis: Cozy up to a cuddly little koala and see what life is like for a young pelican who lives by the water.
episodes.title: Pelican & Koala

episodes.synopsis: From the small but mighty kestrel falcon to a cat that lives in the wild, hear from young animals about their lives growing up.
episodes.title: Kestrel Falcon & Cat

episodes.synopsis: Journey high into the air and deep into the sea and learn firsthand what life is like growing up as an animal in these habitats.
episodes.title: Friends From Sea & Friends From Air

episodes.synopsis: Visit the heart of the savannah and experience the joy of friendship as young animals take you on exciting adventures.
episodes.title: Friends From Savanah & My Best Friends
